languages.text: "Быть может, ваши мысли потекут в нужное русло, шерин, если я смогу их направить. Наверняка у вас есть кто-то на примете, с кем стоит наладить отношения. Строгие {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}друзианцы{/g}? Горячие головы-пираты? {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g}? Нужно лишь подобрать правильные слова — как ключ к замку. И люди откроют вам свои души. Или кошельки. А я все устрою, только скажите".

traits.locale_text: "Быть может, ваши мысли потекут в нужное русло, шерин, если я смогу их направить. Наверняка у вас есть кто-то на примете, с кем стоит наладить отношения. Строгие {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}друзианцы{/g}? Горячие головы-пираты? {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g}? Нужно лишь подобрать правильные слова — как ключ к замку. И люди откроют вам свои души. Или кошельки. А я все устрою, только скажите".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Perhaps your thoughts will move in the right direction with a little encouragement from me, shereen. You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."
languages.original_text: "Быть может, ваши мысли потекут в нужное русло, шерин, если я смогу их направить. Наверняка у вас есть кто-то на примете, с кем стоит наладить отношения. Строгие {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}друзианцы{/g}? Горячие головы-пираты? {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g}? Нужно лишь подобрать правильные слова — как ключ к замку. И люди откроют вам свои души. Или кошельки. А я все устрою, только скажите".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps your thoughts will move in the right direction with a little encouragement from me, shereen. You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."

The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps your thoughts will move in the right direction with a little encouragement from me, shereen. You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps your thoughts will move in the right direction with a little encouragement from me, shereen. You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “或许只要有了我的一点点鼓励，你的想法就会朝着正确的方向发展，亲爱的。你肯定希望能与某个派系建立联系吧？比如说，严肃的{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}圣德鲁苏斯教派{/g}？或是脾气暴躁的{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}海盗？只要采取正确的谈话方式，就像钥匙插进锁里那样，人们就会对你敞开心扉，或是敞开他们的钱包。这一切我都可以替你安排，你只要开口就好。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps your thoughts will move in the right direction with a little encouragement from me, shereen. You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."

traits.locale_text: “或许只要有了我的一点点鼓励，你的想法就会朝着正确的方向发展，亲爱的。你肯定希望能与某个派系建立联系吧？比如说，严肃的{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}圣德鲁苏斯教派{/g}？或是脾气暴躁的{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}海盗？只要采取正确的谈话方式，就像钥匙插进锁里那样，人们就会对你敞开心扉，或是敞开他们的钱包。这一切我都可以替你安排，你只要开口就好。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Tal vez pueda ayudar empujando sus pensamientos a la dirección correcta, shereen. Seguro que hay una facción con la que le gustaría establecer una relación favorable, ¿verdad? ¿Los adustos {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}drusianos{/g}? ¿Los osados piratas de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? Solo tiene que decir las palabras correctas, como una llave para una cerradura, y la gente abrirá su corazón para usted. O su cartera. Yo me encargaré de todo: solo tiene que pedirlo».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps your thoughts will move in the right direction with a little encouragement from me, shereen. You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez pueda ayudar empujando sus pensamientos a la dirección correcta, shereen. Seguro que hay una facción con la que le gustaría establecer una relación favorable, ¿verdad? ¿Los adustos {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}drusianos{/g}? ¿Los osados piratas de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? Solo tiene que decir las palabras correctas, como una llave para una cerradura, y la gente abrirá su corazón para usted. O su cartera. Yo me encargaré de todo: solo tiene que pedirlo».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「おそらく、あたしにちょっと口添えさせてうまいコト進めたいって考えているんでしょう、シャリーン。関係を持ちたい派閥だってあるのよね？厳格な{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}ドルシアン{/g}？短気な宇宙海賊の{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}？錠前に合う鍵を選ぶようなものよ。正しい言葉選びをするだけで心を開いてくれる。お財布もね。お願いひとつであたしが全部手配してあげるわ」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps your thoughts will move in the right direction with a little encouragement from me, shereen. You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."

traits.locale_text: 「おそらく、あたしにちょっと口添えさせてうまいコト進めたいって考えているんでしょう、シャリーン。関係を持ちたい派閥だってあるのよね？厳格な{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}ドルシアン{/g}？短気な宇宙海賊の{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}？錠前に合う鍵を選ぶようなものよ。正しい言葉選びをするだけで心を開いてくれる。お財布もね。お願いひとつであたしが全部手配してあげるわ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Cela dit, je peux peut-être vous convaincre de revoir votre copie. Il y a sûrement une faction avec laquelle vous aimeriez entrer en relation. Les austères {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusiens{/g}, peut-être ? Ou bien les redoutables pirates de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} ? À chaque verrou la clé qui lui correspond ; il suffit de savoir choisir les bons mots pour que les gens vous ouvrent leur cœur. Ou mieux encore, leur bourse. Je peux tout arranger, vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps your thoughts will move in the right direction with a little encouragement from me, shereen. You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."

traits.locale_text: « Cela dit, je peux peut-être vous convaincre de revoir votre copie. Il y a sûrement une faction avec laquelle vous aimeriez entrer en relation. Les austères {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusiens{/g}, peut-être ? Ou bien les redoutables pirates de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} ? À chaque verrou la clé qui lui correspond ; il suffit de savoir choisir les bons mots pour que les gens vous ouvrent leur cœur. Ou mieux encore, leur bourse. Je peux tout arranger, vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Vielleicht kann ich Eure Gedanken mit ein wenig Ermunterung in die richtige Richtung lenken, Shereen. Habt Ihr vielleicht eine Gruppierung im Sinn, mit der Ihr gerne Beziehungen aufnehmen würdet? Die gefürchteten {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusianer{/g}? Die heißblütigen Piraten der {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? Mit den richtigen Worten öffnen die Leute wie mit einem Schlüssel bei einem Schloss ihr Herz für Euch. Oder ihre Geldbörsen. Ich werde alles arrangieren, Ihr müsst nur fragen."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps your thoughts will move in the right direction with a little encouragement from me, shereen. You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht kann ich Eure Gedanken mit ein wenig Ermunterung in die richtige Richtung lenken, Shereen. Habt Ihr vielleicht eine Gruppierung im Sinn, mit der Ihr gerne Beziehungen aufnehmen würdet? Die gefürchteten {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusianer{/g}? Die heißblütigen Piraten der {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? Mit den richtigen Worten öffnen die Leute wie mit einem Schlüssel bei einem Schloss ihr Herz für Euch. Oder ihre Geldbörsen. Ich werde alles arrangieren, Ihr müsst nur fragen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Belki seni biraz teşvik edersem fikrini değiştirip duruma daha uygun bir açıdan bakmanı sağlayabilirim. Aklında çalışmak, görüşmek istediğin birileri vardır mutlaka. Haşin {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drususçular{/g} ya da asabi {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} korsanları mesela? Doğru sözcükleri kullanınca anahtarla kilit açarcasına insanlar da sana kendi kalplerini açıyor. Cüzdanlarını da. Her şeyi ayarlayabilirim, istemen yeterli."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps your thoughts will move in the right direction with a little encouragement from me, shereen. You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."

traits.locale_text: "Belki seni biraz teşvik edersem fikrini değiştirip duruma daha uygun bir açıdan bakmanı sağlayabilirim. Aklında çalışmak, görüşmek istediğin birileri vardır mutlaka. Haşin {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drususçular{/g} ya da asabi {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} korsanları mesela? Doğru sözcükleri kullanınca anahtarla kilit açarcasına insanlar da sana kendi kalplerini açıyor. Cüzdanlarını da. Her şeyi ayarlayabilirim, istemen yeterli."
